yes I was thinking about posting something similar. Id like to hear from more people on this. I can relate to this. It's apathy which is a sign of anxiety and depression. Narcs suffer from anxiety and depression too because of shame I believe. That is my understanding on this topic anyway. Check out this article.

[https://www.psychologytoday.com/us/blog/evolution-the-self/201604/the-curse-apathy-sources-and-solutions](https://www.psychologytoday.com/us/blog/evolution-the-self/201604/the-curse-apathy-sources-and-solutions)

I've started to contest the thought I'll never be able to have a healthy, loving relationship by thinking instead that someone might want to be with me despite my current negative outlook in life and imperfections. It's hard, nearly unbelievable. We'll see what happens.
Thanks for commenting, the article explains how I feel very accurately. Shame makes sense as a possible cause. Let's see if anyone else has some more input on this. Good luck x
